title: What can I do if third-party applications close unexpectedly?
answer:
l   You phone memory may be insufficient. To free up your phone memory:

On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Phone accelerator** > **Storage cleaner** > **Smart scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to perform a smart scan, and clear the application cache, system trash files, applications you no longer need and their installation packages, and large files, such as videos and compressed packages.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205715741001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205715547002.jpg)

l   Some third-party applications may not be compatible with your phone. You can try replacing them with similar applications.

If the problem persists, restart your phone or back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205716737003.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
